title: raised back of hand: light skin tone

adjectives: Increased, particularly above a normal level.
verbs: Raise the level or amount of something
nouns: A return made with the back of the hand facing the direction of the stroke
The backhand is a tennis shot in which one swings the racquet around one's body with the back of the hand preceding the palm.
A stroke made across the chest from the off-hand side to the racquet hand side; a stroke during which the back of the hand faces the shot.

description: This version of the  Raised Back of Hand emoji has the  Light Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Pale Skin Tone on supported pla

The hand is shown with its palm facing away, fingers slightly curved, exuding a sense of gentle stopping or a subtle signal for attention.
